quotes.quote: Poverty is the schoolmaster of character.
quotes.author: Antiphanes

quotes.quote: Poverty is the parent of revolution and crime.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Where justice is denied, where poverty is enforced, where ignorance prevails, and where any one class is made to feel that society is in an organized conspiracy to oppress, rob, and degrade them, neither persons nor property will be safe.
quotes.author: Frederick Douglass

quotes.quote: You are going to let the fear of poverty govern your life and your reward will be that you will eat, but you will not live.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: It is not the rich man you should properly call happy, but him who knows how to use with wisdom the blessings of the gods, to endure hard poverty, and who fears dishonor worse than death, and is not afraid to die for cherished friends or fatherland.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: Climbing out of poverty by your own efforts that is something on which to pride yourself, but poverty itself is romanticized only by fools.
quotes.author: J. K. Rowling

quotes.quote: It is not an ennobling experience. Poverty entails fear and stress and sometimes depression. It means a thousand petty humiliations and hardships.
quotes.author: J. K. Rowling

quotes.quote: It is not easy for men to rise whose qualities are thwarted by poverty.
quotes.author: Juvenal

quotes.quote: It is pretty hard to tell what does bring happiness; poverty and wealth have both failed.
quotes.author: Kin Hubbard

quotes.quote: Wealth is the parent of luxury and indolence, and poverty of meanness and viciousness, and both of discontent.
quotes.author: Plato
